Uses of Class
android.preference.Preference

Packages that use Preference
android.preference Provides classes that manage application preferences and implement the preferences UI. 
 

Uses of Preference in android.preference
 

Subclasses of Preference in android.preference
 class CheckBoxPreference
          A Preference that provides checkbox widget functionality.
 class DialogPreference
          A base class for Preference objects that are dialog-based.
 class EditTextPreference
          A Preference that allows for string input.
 class ListPreference
          A Preference that displays a list of entries as a dialog.
 class PreferenceCategory
          Used to group Preference objects and provide a disabled title above the group.
 class PreferenceGroup
          A container for multiple Preference objects.
 class PreferenceScreen
          Represents a top-level Preference that is the root of a Preference hierarchy.
 class RingtonePreference
          A Preference that allows the user to choose a ringtone from those on the device.
 class SeekBarPreference
           
 class VolumePreference

          Finds a Preference based on its key.

          Finds a Preference based on its key.
protected  Preference Preference.findPreferenceInHierarchy(String key)
          Finds a Preference in this hierarchy (the whole thing, even above/below your PreferenceScreen screen break) with the given key.
 Preference PreferenceGroupAdapter.getItem(int position)
           
 Preference PreferenceGroup.getPreference(int index)
          Returns the Preference at a particular index.
